storyInfo: Silence finally uncovers the true purpose of the experiment and steps up to put a stop to Dorothy. The group struggles to defeat her, while Ptilopsis uses her special sensory abilities to find the missing test subjects. They are sleeping peacefully.

attributes.content: 'Hello, Mary. When was the last time I wrote to you? I'm afraid I was never able to muster the courage to speak to you after the incident.
I could not sleep at all last night. Memories from childhood kept intruding into my mind.
Remember when you were fifteen, and we climbed up the judge statue in the center of town?
You joked that it was illegal, and that you would arrest me when you became a cop.
And I... what did I say?
'Everyone has the right to enjoy fairness and justice.'
I could not have imagined what would become of me in just a few years.
Civilization is a fragile thing. Not much separates us from the burdenbeasts outside the nomadic cities.
Fairness and justice have become alien concepts. All I think of, day in, day out, is how to survive.
Yes, I have become the kind of man you most despise. The kind that I used to most despise.
(Signs of erasure)
What if I have the chance to return to the embrace of civilization? To go back to the man I used to be?
Your birthday is just a week away. You have no idea how much I would love to surprise you.
(Long blank, then hastily scribbled words)
They're performing dangerous experiments on us. All I can do is try to keep living.'
S-Sir. Our bolts...
attributes.name: Pioneer Team Member

attributes.content: They... stopped in mid-air?
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: The bolts headed towards her and the lab equipment are frozen in mid-air.
It is as though they are being held by countless invisible hands.
Dorothy raises a hand.
She touches one of the bolts with her finger.
It gives off a light hum.
Hit the deck!
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: What the...?
attributes.name: Pioneer Team Member

attributes.content: There is a loud bang, like a heavy metal object being dropped to the floor.
The bolts have fallen to the ground—but only part of them. The heads of the bolts have disappeared, leaving behind only an eerily smooth cross-section.
No, they did not disappear.
Did you hear that, Elena?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: It sounded like...
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Like metal vibrating at an extremely high frequency.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: The heads of the bolts shook themselves apart.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: How powerful could Director Franks's Originium Arts be?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: It's not all Arts.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: It's her technique. She's THE authority on applied Originium Arts.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: The Pioneers won't be able to lay a finger on her.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: You're right. There's someone else we should be worried about...
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Oww...
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: Take care of Joyce. She's still in bad shape.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Not to mention Sonny and his men...
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Firebomb!
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: On it!
attributes.name: Pioneer Team Member

attributes.content: Don't aim, just throw!
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Good god...
attributes.name: Pioneer Team Member

attributes.content: Why... why won't you listen?
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: I don't want to see you hurt.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: Why don't you tell that to the men you tricked onto your lab table?
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: I didn't trick them.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: They're safe. Very safe.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: If the experiment succeeds, they'll never have to face the dangers of the wastes again.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: Isn't that what you wanted, Sonny?
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: Watch out!
attributes.name: Pioneer Team Member

attributes.content: Sam...?
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Sir... Sonny, run...
attributes.name: Pioneer Team Member

attributes.content: Take the others and get out...
attributes.name: Pioneer Team Member

attributes.content: Out to the barrenlands... where the corporations can't find you.
attributes.name: Pioneer Team Member

attributes.content: The barrenlands...
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Yes... we're Pioneers...
attributes.name: Pioneer Team Member

attributes.content: Ha... haha! They're afraid of the wastes... we're not!
attributes.name: Pioneer Team Member

attributes.content: Run?
Turn, and run from your friends, run from your answers.
Run away and live. Isn't that what I've always wanted?
What's that, Sonny... a letter? Someone back in town waiting for you to write? Man, you lucky bastard.
attributes.name: Pioneer Team Member

attributes.content: Maybe it'll become evidence.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Evidence?
attributes.name: Pioneer Team Member

attributes.content: To let the people out there know what happened to us.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: I thought we were just gonna save Dirk and the others.
attributes.name: Pioneer Team Member

attributes.content: What if we fail?
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: I wanna leave behind something, Sam. If we don't make it, I want people to know that we tried.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: He wants to live.
But more than that, he wants someone to hear his voice.
Why do we have to wait for you to give us a chance?
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: That's not fair.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: He finds one of the bolts on the ground.
It's missing the head, but he still has his hands.
He's lost much to Oripathy. But he also gained a little bit—a sliver of power.
In the grand scheme of things, that power can't make a difference. Here and now, though, it is enough to snap the bolt in half.
The sharp cross-section could be a weapon against the enemy before him, to break the shackles imposed upon him.
Don't come any closer.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: Grr...
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: He loses control of the bolt he's holding, then his hands themselves.
A powerful but invisible force grabs his wrists, forcing him to stop.
My research was never intended to be used against you.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: It was designed to help you deal with the beasts of the wastes, overcome harsh terrain, and survive Catastrophes. To give you a chance.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: It's supposed to protect you!
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: Hah... protect us?
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Did you ever ask what we wanted?
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: He will move forward. The more it is denied him, the more he will struggle.
The broken bolt tears through his skin, causing blood to drip from it.
Won't you just let this go?
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: Ha... haha!
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: No, I don't wanna.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: What's the situation at the site?
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Defense says no one has left it.
attributes.name: Rhine Lab Tech

attributes.content: If all goes according to plan, Dorothy's 'Hub' should be complete by now.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Any news from Elena?
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Negative.
attributes.name: Rhine Lab Tech

attributes.content: As of the last communication, she had not arrived at the observation station. Defense staff have not seen her.
attributes.name: Rhine Lab Tech

attributes.content: Go and prepare the latest batch of Transmitter.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: How much do you need?
attributes.name: Rhine Lab Tech

attributes.content: One-third.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Time is running out for Rhine Lab.
attributes.name: Colonel's Voice

attributes.content: The experiments are going well, Colonel. We're in the final phase.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: We can't wait much longer.
attributes.name: Colonel's Voice

attributes.content: The aftershocks of the Victorian Incident continue to reverberate. Both our friends and our enemies are making preparations.
attributes.name: Colonel's Voice

attributes.content: We believe a weapon like that remains in the hands of someone, somewhere.
attributes.name: Colonel's Voice

attributes.content: A century of hard work could vanish in the blink of an eye if they target one of our cities.
attributes.name: Colonel's Voice

attributes.content: We'll be dragged back under the dark clouds, at the mercy of other nations.
attributes.name: Colonel's Voice

attributes.content: That's why we need more advanced technology... the technology to deliver our weapons to any location with precision, regardless of distance.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Yes. Columbia needs a 'guide'.
attributes.name: Colonel's Voice

attributes.content: You're smart, Clooney, and you're more practical than most smart people.
attributes.name: Colonel's Voice

attributes.content: When this deal is done, I look forward to a fruitful partnership with the new Control of Rhine Lab.
attributes.name: Colonel's Voice

attributes.content: The feeling is mutual.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Send more hands to the labs to package the reagents.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Yes, I need all of it.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Whew... these guys are a headache.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: You've seen my Arts. They're nowhere near as practical as Greyy's.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Yes, we've proven that their liquid structure is extremely resilient.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: And there is worse news.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Did I mention that there's more of this material stored above us, all over the lab complex? Like, ten thousand times more, give or take.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Maybe you should have mentioned that sooner.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: You said they were byproducts of the experiments. What was the main objective?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: A new technology that would replace traditional Arts Units.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Energy was responsible for developing this special material. It's extremely sensitive to microvibrations, making it the ideal medium for receiving and encoding neural signals.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: We call it 'Transmitter'.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Under ideal circumstances, it can turn someone with ordinary Originium Arts assimilation into an outstanding caster.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: That's why... even the byproduct... can be very... dangerous!
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Olivia, I can't fight and give a lecture at the same time.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Sometimes I wish I had one of those devices like in Joyce's brain. That way, I could tell you stuff with just a thought.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Well then, let me ask another question.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: How do we stop this experiment?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: I know you put a lot into it, and I understand your loyalty to Dorothy. But...
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Enough, Olivia, you're reminding me of my sister again.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: The project is important to me, but something's clearly not right with Dorothy... did you think I was the kind of person who can't get my priorities straight?
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: I... just... need... to... think.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: I haven't spent enough time here. I wish I pestered Dorothy more...
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: ...The caster.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Elena, if the things before us are products of Originium Arts, where is the caster?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: It's not Dorothy controlling them. They're just there by her side.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: The missing Pioneers...
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: The one place in the lab that Dorothy is most hesitant to show us.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Use your Originium Arts, Elena! Aim behind her!
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Max power, right?
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Starlight rains from the sky, catching everybody's attention for an instant.
Even the strange silver entities.
No, not there!
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: You shouldn't have done that, Elena.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: I... I can't stop... what's going on?
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: It's like my limbs aren't my own... how much is that equipment worth? Never mind... got to hold on...
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: It's not just us. Even the Pioneers...
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: An earthquake?
attributes.name: Pioneer Team Member

attributes.content: Hang in there!
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Star... stars...
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: Joyce... Olivia... I can't keep my hold on her...
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: I'm losing sensation in my hands!
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: A-Arts...!
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Never thought the day would come when I would be giving myself electric shocks...
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Electric?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Electricity can interfere with Originium Arts effects...
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Did you say that this research is focused on vibration?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Yeah... and?
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Sand.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Sand's everywhere in the lab. On us, too... so small we never even noticed.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Keep looking for the test subjects, Elena!
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: I'll stop Dorothy.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Sir, the reagents have been loaded.
attributes.name: Rhine Lab Tech

attributes.content: Good. We're going to Site 359.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: You're going there personally?
attributes.name: Rhine Lab Tech

attributes.content: Did I not make myself clear?
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Er, I just thought there were enough staff there already...
attributes.name: Rhine Lab Tech

attributes.content: Tell me, why is it that the more important an experiment is, the more times it has to be repeated?
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Er... to avoid errors?
attributes.name: Rhine Lab Tech

attributes.content: Because an important result must be absolutely reliable.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Is Director Franks not reliable?
attributes.name: Rhine Lab Tech

attributes.content: Dorothy? She is driven by her emotions, and achieved great things because of them.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: But her emotions may also become a weakness, at key moments.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: What about Elena?
attributes.name: Rhine Lab Tech

attributes.content: I hope you grow faster than her.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: She is motivated, but too inexperienced. She may not be able to make the best possible decision without my advice.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: There's only one person at Rhine Lab whom I trust implicitly—me.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Dr. Silence...
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: *Cough*... hello, Director Franks.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: How did you come this far? I thought the vibration membrane would cut off nerve signals to your limbs.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: I'm a physician. I know the human body a little better than you do.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: I'm sorry. I know it must be uncomfortable.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: The experiment will be complete in just a little bit. I'll set you free when we're done.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: And then...?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Is it really worth the damage that's being done?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Look at the people who are struggling right now.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Don't... give... up!
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Grab... my... hand!
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Those focused on the future tend to ignore what's happening in front of them.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: I've seen many people like that at Rhine Lab.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: But Director Franks... Dorothy... you're not like them.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: There are tears in your eyes when you look at Sonny and the other Pioneers.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: I can feel their pain.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: But which is worse? A moment of pain, or an eternity of pain?
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: The life they lead is a quagmire, Dr. Silence.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: I want to pull them up, give them the same chances that you and I once had.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: A drowning man may struggle even more when he feels someone pulling him.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: But is that really him refusing help?
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: The bog has choked them, but I hear their cries for help. I've extended my hand, and I'm not about to pull it back now.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: But you need to stop.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Your drone... when did you...?
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: While you were talking.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: I've seen many places since I left Rhine Lab, some of them even worse than this sand-filled lab of yours.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: A physician knows how to keep her equipment clean at all times.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Still...
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: Dorothy... she won't even think about giving up...
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: (My hands are getting number.)
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: (Another shock? I'll probably fry my nerves.)
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: ...Light.
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: Light? My Arts? You didn't used to love my Arts show this much, Joyce.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Stars... bright...
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: Far away.
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: Where are you looking... what are you looking at?
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: No, what really matters isn't what you're looking at...
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: It's what you know... what did you learn that Olivia and I didn't?
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Home...
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: In the light.
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: You... you're moving?
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Wait, you were unconscious... that's why the vibration membrane didn't affect you as much.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: The direction you're pointing...
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: That's the direction the silver constructs are gathering in.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: I know where the missing people went.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Look, a door opened—
attributes.name: Pioneer Team Member

attributes.content: That's...
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Door... opened?
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: No, look out—
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: All the vibrations stop.
The silver constructs dissolve into harmless pools of liquid.
Dorothy too stops dead in her tracks, giving up resistance even with Silence's drone at her neck.
All she sees is the door, and everything behind it.
What she vowed to protect, and the countless dreams that she carries.
